dissent.translation[0].definitions[0].de: refusal to agree with an official decision or accepted opinion
dissent.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: the ruthless suppression of political dissent
These voices of dissent grew louder.
dissent.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a statement by a judge giving their reasons for disagreeing with the other judges in a law case
dissent.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to say that you disagree with an official decision or accepted opinion
dissent.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: There are some dissenting voices  (=people who do not agree) among the undergraduates.
Few historians would dissent from this view.
dissent.translation[1].definitions[1].de: if a judge dissents, they say formally that they do not agree with the other judges in a law case
